com.qubecell.ui
Class ValidateOTPActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.qubecell.ui.BaseActivity
          com.qubecell.ui.ValidateOTPActivity

public class ValidateOTPActivity
extends BaseActivity

The ValidateOTPActivity class is used to display screen for submitting OTP validation code and sending to server for validation.

Author:
Vikram
